summary: 19-year-old Ray Pye murders two young women. Four years later, detective Charlie Schilling knows that Ray did it. He just needs to prove it. Meanwhile, Ray has met his match in a new girl in town, Katherine Wallace.
cast: Marc Senter|Shay Astar|Alex Frost|Megan Henning|Robin Sydney|Michael Bowen|Ed Lauter|Dee Wallace|Erin Brown|Ruby Larocca|Tom Ayers|Tony Carreiro|Katie Cassidy|Cynthia Cervini|Rob Elk|Cornelia Guest|Alice Hirson|Jesse Hlubik|Jack Ketchum|Cristiana Ladki|Mike McKee|Shelli Merrill|Tony Moras|Belle Morte|Linda Pine|Richard Riehle|Helen Siff|Eddie Steeples|Justin Stone|Luke Y. Thompson|Trevor Graciano
keywords: female frontal nudity|topless female nudity|female full frontal nudity|female nudity|murder of a pregnant woman
title: The Lost
